text: Temperature uniformity surveys shall be performed in accordance with the requirements of this section.
rationale: Ensures that temperature uniformity is consistently maintained within the furnace.

text: The temperature uniformity survey shall be conducted at the minimum and maximum operating temperatures of the furnace.
rationale: Verifies that temperature uniformity is maintained across the operating range.

text: Temperature uniformity surveys shall use calibrated thermocouples placed in the work zone.
rationale: Ensures accurate measurement of temperature across the furnace work zone.
verification_method: Review of TUS documentation and thermocouple calibration records

text: Initial temperature uniformity surveys shall be conducted prior to production use.
rationale: Establishes baseline for temperature uniformity before actual production use.

text: Temperature uniformity surveys shall be conducted at least quarterly for continuous furnaces and at least annually for batch furnaces.
rationale: Ensures ongoing verification of temperature uniformity at appropriate intervals.
verification_method: Review of TUS schedule and completed surveys

text: System accuracy tests shall be performed at least quarterly.
rationale: Ensures regular verification of temperature measurement system accuracy.

text: System accuracy tests shall be performed by comparing the furnace temperature controller reading to a calibrated test instrument.
rationale: Verifies the accuracy of the temperature control system.
verification_method: Review of SAT documentation and procedure

text: All thermocouples used for temperature uniformity surveys shall be calibrated.
rationale: Ensures accurate temperature measurement during surveys.

text: Process parameters shall be documented and controlled.
rationale: Ensures consistent and repeatable thermal processing.
verification_method: Review of process documentation and records

text: All equipment used for thermal processing shall be calibrated at defined intervals.
rationale: Ensures accuracy and reliability of thermal processing equipment.
verification_method: Review of calibration records and schedules

text: Preventive maintenance shall be performed on thermal processing equipment according to a defined schedule.
rationale: Ensures reliable operation and prevents equipment failures.
verification_method: Review of maintenance records and schedules
